text: Rampage is an American science fiction monster movie directed by Brad Peyton. It is loosely based on the video game series of the same name by Midway Games. The movie stars Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris, Malin Ã…kerman, Joe Manganiello, Jake Lacy, P. J. Byrne, Marley Shelton, and Jeffrey Dean Morgan. It is produced by Warner Bros. and set in Chicago, Illinois. New Line Cinema will release the movie on April 20, 2018 in 3D and IMAX. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2018 science fiction movies Category:2018 action movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:American monster movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about animals Category:Giant gorilla movies Category:Movies about wolves Category:Movies about crocodiles Category:Movies about giants Category:Movies about genetic engineering
title: Rampage (2018 movie)
